title: The Raven Taming Game
alternative_title: Du Ya De Xunfu Youxi ; Dù Yā De Xùnfú Yóuxì ; The Raven Taming Game ; 渡鸦的驯服游戏
status: Du Ya De Xunfu Youxi ; Dù Yā De Xùnfú Yóuxì ; The Raven Taming Game ; 渡鸦的驯服游戏
description:
Description :
        Late 19th Century, Paris, France. Vincent, a third-rate painter, accidentally witnesses a crime scene and, in order to survive, is forced to work at a gallery run by Roland, a mafia with ulterior motives. However, the seemingly fragile painter has a hidden identity. As they search for a stolen antique sketch, the situation between the underworld and the law spirals out of control. In the furnace of fame, fortune, and desire, who will ultimately tame whom? Watch as the weak painter turns the tables in Paris's underground world! Cold Younger Mafia x Cunning Older Painter
